list.description: Slows down Stamina depletion when evading, blocking, etc.
Increased Health recovery from items, and Antidote Herb and Bitterbug always work.
Increases damage for all types of Barrel Bombs, and increases the power of Blast attacks.
Sometimes increases the number of times items can be gathered at Gathering Points.
Increases the power of Normal shots (Normal S).
Decreases the likelihood of Horn/Flute items breaking.
Decreases Stamina depletion when fleeing from large monsters.
Increases damage of projectiles such as Stones, Throwing Knives, and Boomerangs.
Increases the number of Hunter Rank Points received for completing a Quest.
Strengthens kicks.
Increases damage inflicted by the Shadowbox gesture.
Prevents stumbling when jumping down from high places.
Grants a temporary Attack boost when you use the Kick Back gesture for a while.
Makes it easier to stun monsters.
Increases Ballista, Crag shot (Crag S), Gunlance, Cannon and Demolisher ammo damage.
Prevents damage from environmental effects.
Increases the amount of Wycademy Points received at the end of a Quest.
Prevents you from sleeping during a Quest, even on the base camp bed.
Often speeds up sharpening time.
Causes food effects to remain even after you faint in battle.
Grants a quick recovery when sent flying by a monster.
Increases the potency of abnormal status attacks.
Decreases the likelihood of Pickaxes and Bug Nets breaking.
Ensures you always begin in Hidden Areas during Quests with random starting points.
Increases Sharpness when you strike right after an attack is deflected.
Makes it easier to escape when pinned down by a large monster.
Displays large monsters on the Map at the start of a Quest for a limited amount of time.
Increases Attack and Defense at the start of a Quest for a limited amount of time.
Fills gauge faster when attacking a monster mounted by another player.
Prevents you from getting knocked on your butt.
Speeds up Palico growth.
Often increases the number of times you can carve.
Sometimes increases the number of times you can carve.
Often decreases damage taken.
Sometimes decreases damage taken.
Increases Combination success rate by 20%.
Increases Combination success rate by 10%.
Greatly extends the invulnerability period when getting up.
Extends the invulnerability period when getting up.
Draws monsters' attention, increasing the likelihood of being targeted.
Makes it easier to mount monsters.
Increases the likelihood fish will bite when fishing.
Causes additional Supply Items to be delivered immediately.
Helps your weapon retain Sharpness when attacks are deflected.

list.nameJa: ネコの毛づくろい上手
list.description: Halves the effect durations of Defense Down and Resistance Down, and speeds Blight recovery.
Prevents knockbacks from attacks while carving.
Slows Stamina depletion from dashing and prevents knockbacks when transporting an item.
Prevents being knocked back when transporting an item.
Decreases Stamina loss on walls or icicles. Also withstands some attacks.
Allows you to withstand some attacks while on walls or icicles.
Guarantees Dung Bombs will be effective, and ensures their Combinations will succeed.
Prevents flinching when discovered by a monster.
Greatly increases Attack when Health is very low.
Large monsters encountered on Quests have an increased chance of being weaker than normal.
Guarantees a large monster will appear when the hunting environment is unstable.
Sometimes increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
Increases the amount of zenny received at the end of a Quest.
Often increases the number of Reward Items received at the end of a Quest.
Slight unfortunate events to occur at the start of a Quest...
Causes unfortunate events to occur at the start of a Quest...
Prevents fainting one time when damage taken exceeds your remaining Health.
Increases Bowgun damage, but also increases Deviation.
Maximizes the number of times you can talk to the Veggie Elder.
Prevents your group from being penalized the first time a member faints.
When you faint, you will recover the health of party members in the same area.
